The photo was shared on Facebook on July: 2020, along with a caption criticizing ABS-CBN supporters for ignoring COVID-19 restrictions.
The photo shows ABS: CBN actor Gerald Anderson surrounded by a crowd carrying posters advocating for the renewal of the network's franchise.
The photo circulated after ABS: CBN celebrities and employees staged a protest against the refusal to approve the broadcaster's operating license application.
